EmailTemplate.subject: New Cross Connect Completion Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The cross connect ordered has been completed per the Letter of Authorization you submitted. Please test your circuit to verify proper operation.
Please reference the Cross Connect ID below when corresponding or referring to this circuit.
Cross Connect Circuit Reference Information:
{!Case.Cross_Connect_Email_Content__c}
If you are having trouble with your fiber circuit please try the following: 1) Swap fiber connectors to change the transmit and receive signals 2) Make sure the circuit is active by calling your provider
If you are having trouble with your copper Ethernet circuit please try the following: 1) Use a cross over patch cable as opposed to a straight through patch cable 2) Make sure the circuit is active by calling your provider
If you are still having problems please replay to this request within the portal.
